question: Which literature associates the works and poems of the famous poet "Hafez"?
explanation: Persian literature associates the works and poems of the famous poet "Hafez". Khwaja Shams-ud-Din Mu?ammad ?afe?-e Shirazi, known by his pen name Hafez, was a Persian poet, whose collected works are regarded by many Iranians as a pinnacle of Persian literature.
